page_content:
Capgemini UK plc

Cybersecurity Security Assurance Service

The Capgemini Security Assurance team of Security Check (SC) and Developed Vetting (DV) cleared Security professionals can provide assurance services comprising policies, processes and controls supporting the protection of information assets through the provision of sustainable security solutions. Our professional can help clients assure their enterprise or cloud services environments.

Features

  • Can provide planning and development of security assurance strategy/programme
  • Can provide Initial scoping interviews using the correct methods
  • Can provide Threat analysis
  • Can use agreed good practice methodologies tailored to client’s needs
  • Can provide Design and conducting Risk Assessments & Gap Analysis
  • Can provide Assessments of controls in place
  • Can Review findings and produce Reports with Recommended actions
  • Can provide Monitoring of, support for, treatment of Recommendations raised
  • Can provide Testing of implemented controls, where agreed and appropriate
  • Can provide Conduct of Security Maturity assessments where deemed beneficial

Benefits

  • Can help provide a coherent Risk based Security Assurance Strategy
  • Can help provide assurance that practices comply with security policies
  • Can help provide Identification and resolution of cloud security vulnerabilities
  • Can help identify cost effective solutions, for necessary security enhancements
  • Can help customers reduce security incidents and related mitigation costs
  • Can help implement security controls in-line with Client’s needs /expectations
  • Can provide assessment of compliance with ISO27001 requirements
  • Can help provide assurance that Security Controls matches business needs
  • Can help security controls be designed around HMG/Industry standards
  • Can aid design and implementation of effective security enhancements

Pricing

£397.0 per person

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Day
